output.sentences: The first speaker approached the podium to begin the conference.
Peace was to be the subject for the many speeches to take place.
Many world leaders were gathered to represent their respective countries at such an important summit.
Men and women spoke about many issues facing the world today.
A diverse mix of cultures brought many differing views and potential solutions to the talks.
